gen:link.msg:message: `TechnicalProvisionsLifeInsurance` SHOULD be equal to the summation of the underlying values. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsLifeInsuranceBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_TechnicalProvisionsLifeInsurance')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsLifeInsuranceBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_TechnicalProvisionsLifeInsurance return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsLifeInsuranceBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfTechnicalProvisionsLifeInsuranceCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsLifeInsuranceBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfTechnicalProvisionsLifeInsuranceCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsLifeInsuranceBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfTechnicalProvisionsLifeInsuranceDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesConsolidatedTechnicalProvisionsLifeInsuranceBreakdownInsurance_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfTechnicalProvisionsLifeInsuranceDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
